author: wn.com
title: Social care services at The Lime and Sedgemoor in spotlight (Liverpool City Council)
text: ( Source : Liverpool City Council ) The next phase of a campaign to promote Liverpool City Council's social care services is getting underway. The Care to Know Campaign is designed to raise the profile of adult social services and public
